suite.name: copy to VM

kw.name: Open Pysphere Connection
kw.doc: Opens a pysphere connection to the given `host`
kw.msg: Pysphere connection opened to host ESX02.STA.COM

test.name: Copying

kw.name: Vm Login In Guest
kw.doc: Logs into the named VM with the specified `username` and `password`.
kw.msg: Logged into VM Win 8.1 Pro x64 - VM4.

kw.name: Vm Send File
kw.doc: Uploads a file from `local_path` to the specified `remote_path` on
kw.msg: Uploading file C:\Users\efarrag\Desktop\robot1\TestTest.txt to C:Robot on VM Win 8.1 Pro x64 - VM4.
VIException: [Invalid Operation]: You must call first login_in_guest

test.status: VIException: [Invalid Operation]: You must call first login_in_guest

kw.name: Close Pysphere Connection
kw.msg: Connection closed, there will no longer be a current pysphere connection.

suite.doc:
This example demonstrates executing commands on a remote machine and getting their output and the return code.
Notice how connections are handled as part of the suite setup and teardown. This saves some time when executing several test cases.

suite.name: Valid Login

test.name: Valid Login

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

suite.doc: A test suite with a single test for valid login. This test has a workflow that is created using keywords from the resource file.
